SEARCH
Package danogl.collisions

Class LayerManager

java.lang.Object
danogl.collisions.LayerManager
public class LayerManager extends Object
Responsible for the layers mechanism, which separates GameObjects to layers. The layers dictate the order of rendering and allows control of which layers collide with which.
Author:
Dan Nirel

  • Method Details

    • doLayersCollide

      public boolean doLayersCollide(int layer1Id, int layer2Id)
      Returns whether two layers are set to collide.
      Returns:
      true if both layers exist and are set to collide, false otherwise.

    • getLayerDrawOrder

      public int getLayerDrawOrder(int layerId)
      Returns a layer's draw-order. This number can be compared to that of another layer to know which would be rendered first (smaller draw-order means being rendered first, and therefore behind).
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If the layer does not exist

    • setLayerDrawOrder

      public void setLayerDrawOrder(int layerId, int drawOrder)
      Set a layer's draw-order. Setting a layer's draw-order to being smaller than another means it will be rendered first (and therefore behind).

    • shouldLayersCollide

      public void shouldLayersCollide(int layer1Id, int layer2Id, boolean shouldCollide)
      Sets whether two layers should collide.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If any of the layers does not exist
